questions.question: What is SPFI 2026?
questions.answer: SPFI 2026 is an exclusive real estate investment expo designed for global Indian investors. It brings together India's most prestigious developers, financial institutions, and high-net-worth individuals in Dubai to explore high-yield property investment opportunities.

questions.question: When and where is the event?
questions.answer: SPFI 2026 will be held on 16-17 May 2026 at DoubleTree by Hilton, Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The event runs from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM each day.

questions.question: Who should attend SPFI 2026?
questions.answer: SPFI 2026 is designed for NRIs & Overseas Indians, global real estate investors, family offices & wealth managers, and high-net-worth individuals seeking high-growth property assets across India.

questions.question: How do I register for the event?
questions.answer: You can register for SPFI 2026 by visiting our Concierge page and selecting your visitor type: Journalist & Social Media Influencer, Exhibitor, or Visitor. Registration is required as spaces are limited to ensure an intimate and valuable experience.

questions.question: What investment opportunities will be available?
questions.answer: SPFI 2026 showcases residential investments (luxury homes, smart apartments, plotted developments, gated communities), commercial & income assets (office spaces, retail assets, mixed-use developments), emerging growth corridors, and provides investment advisory services.

questions.question: What financial services are available at the event?
questions.answer: SPFI 2026 offers on-spot bank loan assistance from leading Indian banks, pre-approved & custom financing, tax & legal guidance for NRIs, and exclusive event-only offers with preferential pricing and flexible payment plans.

questions.question: Is there a dress code?
questions.answer: Yes, the dress code is Business Formal or Traditional Indian Attire. We recommend dressing elegantly to match the exclusive nature of the event.

questions.question: What cities and developers will be featured?
questions.answer: SPFI 2026 features premium destinations including Mumbai (Godrej, Lodha, Raheja), Bengaluru (Prestige, Sobha, Brigade), and Delhi NCR (DLF, M3M, Emaar), showcasing India's most promising real estate markets.

questions.question: Can I get directions to the venue?
questions.answer: The event is at DoubleTree by Hilton, Dubai, United Arab Emirates. You can get directions by clicking the 'Get Directions' link on our Investment Insights page or by contacting our concierge team.

questions.question: What makes SPFI 2026 different from other real estate events?
questions.answer: SPFI 2026 is an exclusive, invitation-only event focused on high-net-worth investors. It offers direct access to decision-makers (not sales representatives), verified properties with rigorous due diligence, proven ROI track records, and end-to-end support from selection to documentation.
